Demand for hot water in residential and non residential  buildings

By 2050, domestic hot water demand is 30% more than in 2015. By 2050, for residential buildings, 23% more homes use wood to heat water than in 2015. the use of solar in homes is the same as in 2015. 23% less homes use electricty to heat water than in 2015. By 2050. For non residential buildings, 3% more buildings use wood to heat water than in 2015. 0.1% more buildings use solar to heat water than in 2015.  2.6% less buildings use electricty to heat water than in 2015. 0.4 % less buildings  use fossil fuel to heat water than in 2015.
